divs: Sighting DetailsRed orb crossed back and forth across south horizon about six or seven times. It then took off to the west and disappeared. I took several shots with my digital camera only. No scope attached. While watching the red orb, I also saw a white orb appear and travel some distance in the sky and then blink out. I also saw a brilliant flash like someone taking my picture from space. There is some weid stuff happening up there.
